articles.author: Sam McNeil
articles.title: EU leaders meet to counter pressure from Russia, China and Trump - AP News
articles.description: European Union leaders are gathering in Belgium as the bloc argues over how to stand up to pressure from the United States, China and Russia. They are meeting Thursday in a Belgian castle in a session meant to shape another summit in late March. German and It…
articles.content: BILZEN-HOESELT, Belgium (AP) Leaders from across the European Union are meeting Thursday in a Belgian castle as the 27-nation bloc faces antagonism from U.S. President Donald Trump, strong-arm econom… [+4628 chars]
